name: ROCK FALL (chaostycoon)
description:
The concept for DOMEJam 2021 is "Minimal".

Rockfall is a game of skill and luck where you are a stone which had been knocked off the side of a mountain by a mountain climber, you need to dodge the incoming rocks to avoid causing a rockfall and causing damage to whatever is at the bottom. your job to to cause as little damage at the bottom as possible.

This is still unfinished but the main parts are there. I had imagined there would be better graphics, a cutscenes and 2 endings. Very ambitious I know.
